name: Popover
description:
Pastry-bomb your way through an evil bakery megacorp and undo the wrongs done to your humble pastry business!

A game made in 8 weeks by students at The Game Assembly school in Malmö, Sweden.

Programmers:
Patrik Fridh
August Smith
Neo Nemeth
Markus Hermelin
Carl Uvebrant

Animators:
Moa Bergman
Jacob Fransson

Level Designers:
Aleksander Bjelovuk
Anton Herlin
Hannes Wäst

Graphics:
Max Kock
Albin Bång
Elin Ekelöv
Daniel Gryningstjerna

Audio Design:
Viggo Robert
Daniel Tjäder

Cutscene Audio:
Steve Oxen
Miguel Johnson
